'"Chronomancer" links here. For the famous [[Netheril|Netherese]] chronomancer, see [[Jeriah Chronos]].''
'''Chronomancy''' was a school of magic dealing with movement through time, or the manipulation of time. It was a secretive and rare school of magic, and most [[wizard]]s had difficulty comprehending the possibility of altering the natural course of events. Those wielding power in this school were known as chronomancers.
